abstract: Trying to catch up with Google, Microsoft says it will change the way computer users search.
snippet: Trying to catch up with Google, Microsoft says it will change the way computer users search.
lead_paragraph: REDMOND, Wash., March 6  Internet searching was at the forefront of the technologies that Microsoft displayed on Tuesday at an event intended to showcase the company’s research prowess.

headline.main: Searching for Michael Jordan? Microsoft Wants a Better Way
headline.print_headline: Searching for Michael Jordan? Microsoft Wants a Better Way
